source: Bigby Presents - Glory of the Giants

ability.name: Primeval Magic
ability.description: You have absorbed primeval magic that gives you an echo of the might of giants. When you hit a target with a melee weapon attack or a ranged weapon attack using a thrown weapon, you can imbue the attack with an additional effect depending on the benefit you chose: Cloud Strike, Fire Strike, Frost Strike, Hill Strike, Stone Strike, or Storm Strike.
